name: Max Schaefer
body: I am a research engineer at [Semmle Ltd.](http://semmle.com) in Oxford. Previously, I was an assistant professor at the [School of Computer Engineering](http://sce.ntu.edu.sg) of [Nanyang Technological University](http://ntu.edu.sg) in Singapore; a post-doctoral researcher at [IBM T.J. Watson Research Center](http://www.watson.ibm.com) in New York; and a PhD student at the [Department of Computer Science](http://cs.ox.ac.uk) of [Oxford University](http://ox.ac.uk).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
